title: Bbq Steak
instructions: Remove planted.steak from packaging and let it come to room temperature for 10 minutes.
Season both sides generously with salt, pepper, and smoked paprika.
Heat a grill pan or skillet over high heat with olive oil until smoking.
Sear the steak for 3-4 minutes per side until caramelized grill marks form.
Brush generously with your favorite BBQ sauce during the last minute of cooking.
Let rest for 2 minutes, then slice against the grain and serve with extra BBQ sauce on the side.
